documents.document: Cafe is playing that song about piña coladas and annoyingly all I hear is IF YOU LIKE PENIS COLADAS because I have a younger brother 🙄
This is gonna be my last issue as co-editor. Write me a thing if you're a GLAM person. It's a really good theme thi… https://t.co/ggDHpcvlBm
When you have something due on deadline, but otoh many many Beyoncé videos on YouTube. https://t.co/VwDv2IT0Ms
The raptors have figured out how to open doors! 😱😱😱 (absolutely no prizes for guessing what I'm watching)
Me: is it superbowl day? A: Yes, *explanation of who is playing, presumably* (long pause) Me: Oh! Sorry, my interest ran out after 'yes'.
Ugh, @nzlabour has officially lost me.
Hi I fucked up my leg again come ON universe srsly https://t.co/OTpf2MHWSB
Emceeing again today. After this I'm retiring to my introvert's cave to not interact with other humans for some hours.
Have snuck out of forum for 20 mins of peace and coffee, and apparently Beyoncé is having twins and I feel like I've been in a cave.
I did it and I was not too bad? Anyway someone else is doing the afternoon sessions because I delegate, bitches.
Emceeing a museum educators' forum this morning. Me, of all people. https://t.co/40LuWzwIcs
At the airport retrieving Australians. My driving in the car with the museum branding remains The Worst.
@MarieJeffriesNZ Thanks!
Where in central Welly would I find baby clothes/things of the kind a frivolous childless aunt might buy?
@Megapope This made me laugh so hard I started choking 😂

Email I have sent to a professional contact today:
'After a series of bizarre Guns n’ Roses-related complications...'
Broke my computer so went for coffee and now I'm back and it's still broken, and like, what do you want from me, computer? That's all I had.
@MsAnna_Jane Exciting! Good luck!
Museums being political/non-neutral spaces and warming my jaded cockles. https://t.co/yOYfSUZQnj
I made a Very Big Decision this week and I'm just sitting here drinking coffee in a cool breeze feeling really 👍 about it.
Walking behind a guy who is reluctant to hold his gf's bag just for a second because it's floral print 🙄
Looking for some newbies for our editorial team. We're nice and it's really good experience! https://t.co/dFjoOYhOzx
Ok if there is a Sherlock series 5 I would like waaay more Molly Hooper being excellent.
Sorting out editorial committee vacancies and new themes for @tauhereconnect without @rebecca_keenan2 is the saddest sadness 😭
Saw a job ad for a firm wanting a writer/editor/comms mgr/office mgr. That's 1 job, part time 24 hrs a week. Lol good luck w recruiting that
Watched the second ep of the new series of Sherlock and WHAAAAT and NOOOO
Watched the first ep of the new series of Sherlock and WHAAAAT also NOOOOOO
@Amber_g_eva I fear I may have gone full dictator, but that's what happens when I get left to my own devices 😊
Tbh the boss owes me for that time she made my awkward Pakeha ass lead the waiata at a mihi whakatau, so. #neverforget #neverforgive
Assigning people emcee duties for different sessions at a hui without consulting them about it 💅🏻💁🏻
Semi-regular love letter to @grouffles, @wildkea and @_mey_day, without whom I would be lost in the wilderness/crying in the toilet ❤❤❤
^ new Twitter bio, probably.
The greatest successes of my 35 unremarkable years of life are my impeccable ratings on @TradeMe and @Airbnb.
Have dug out my swipe card and phone, and set my alarm for 6.30, and everything is terrible.
Haven't seen Best Work Friend since she left me in the emergency dept a month ago and skipped town. This is a) true, b) how rumours start.
Well played, Grandad 😂 https://t.co/rYrYT35dNW
Despicable white men posing completely unironically with their barbed wire wall. GTFO. https://t.co/wjYyBdShoE
Am all about infertility Twitter tbh.
@gurrlwithacurl You're right. I don't know what I was thinking. I'll clear another drawer for them. #cardiganlife
@gurrlwithacurl There are just. So. Many. (I give it 2 weeks till I crack)
Also I'm not allowed to buy any more #cardigans❤ for like a year. Jeebus.
Went through my wardrobe and removed literally everything that doesn't fit. This is the single nicest thing I've ev… https://t.co/vTyRFIMbV5
It's my grandparents' 69th wedding anniversary today. Can you IMAGINE.
@librarykris @thecapitalidea It's not bad! Decent coffee 👍
@thecapitalidea AND FURTHERMORE I disagree with their spelling of nibbly
There was even a song about it. @thecapitalidea
We're at cafe called The Nibbley Pig in Woodville cause @thecapitalidea spotted it on the way north & insisted we come back to it. I ask you
@grouffles @TuskCulture @_mey_day @wildkea Aw Jane ❤ Professional support from people I have a personal relationship with is sooo invaluable
This beautiful artwork by Tiffany Singh and Jo Blogg makes the whole Glimpse of India exhibition… https://t.co/eukiNysfB9
Lil cracker 👌 https://t.co/rEc4YzSFNY
A shark I met once @ National Aquarium of New Zealand https://t.co/jXPcvZBW9J
See you back at (4 letter word starting with W) in a couple of weeks https://t.co/0GdSefFaEK
That time I drove to Napier then walked in the sun after a terrible night's sleep then got drunk from 2 glasses of rosé. THAT TIME IS NOW.
Bleak small town skate park #anoccasionalseries @ Dannevirke https://t.co/DADsfumjnW
Removed paint from @thecapitalidea's ears using nail polish remover while he grimaced ostentatiously #marriage
Me: this 3 week holiday is awesome and just what I needed My subconscious: lol ok here are some inexplicably brutal nightmares
Holiday cleanup 6: phone call for you from 2007. https://t.co/99XDPWVMaa
Day went from 'I'm gonna put the washing outside' to 'I'm gonna close all the windows' in the time it took to eat a sandwich.
@PeopleofNZ In a hot second. I'd go back to uni.
Suze and I have been very busy today. https://t.co/fZ40CzCVV8
And that is how someone who hates cooking ends up attempting chicken parmesan and sticky date pudding 😳
Promised A I'd make him anything he wanted for dinner in exchange for helping stepdad build a retaining wall while Mum & I shopped/day drank
Holiday cleanup 5: Tiny Tamara can move in circles, is vocal, and, alas, constipated. https://t.co/76Qku39AGf
Holiday cleanup 4: From Uncle Frank, France, 1917 https://t.co/yRUKdpJKQh
Holiday cleanup 2: Nana and her brother George in the 1920s. Conservation framing required! https://t.co/NukgeX0oGS
Holiday cleanup 1: my parents' extremely 1978 wedding photo. https://t.co/cbJ2EDzpwr
Happy New Year to me! #bathlife @ Martinborough, N.Z. https://t.co/5mF6qZdpaV
@AMidnightVoyage He totes Arama-proofed our decks. Until he's old enough to climb, anyway!
Stepdad built us a retaining wall and fixed our deck rails so our friends' kids can't crawl off… https://t.co/alCdGfdShs
Mum's been visiting #nonhereditarygreenthumb https://t.co/cdbf38uVw9
Ok so my leg is not up to amazing solo dancing to I'm Your Man. Ouch. Noted.
@gurrlwithacurl Ugh. I'll be hoping you pull through!
.@thecapitalidea is on the phone to Vodafone trying to sort why we were overcharged. Godspeed, my wee trooper *hand on heart, single tear*
@gurrlwithacurl For the love of god, why?!
If, for you, celebrity deaths = 2016 was the woooorst, congratulations on your charmed life.
We stood on the deck and watched the @Space_Station pass overhead. Just a bright dot moving through the sky ⭐️
@thelemonofpink Brilliant, thank you. I'll give it a go!
@ehjc @thelemonofpink It looked so good and I wanna make something like it for my visiting mama.
Someone (@thelemonofpink maybe?) made an amazing looking baked chicken/potato thing the other day. WAS IT YOU and can I pls have the recipe?
Leaving the house to see other humans for the first time today. I am so good at Christmas 👍
@thelemonofpink Idk what came over me (and thanks!)
@morganeleanor That's gorgeous!
Bb's first Meadowlark 🎉 https://t.co/zMaxhTuFqE
.@thecapitalidea bought presents for our cats and signed them from the big cats (that's us) with kisses. I die 😍 https://t.co/rYLoSJ5ViJ
In an envelope addressed to Mr & Mrs <@thecapitalidea's first initial and last name>. I GUESS WE'RE STILL DISAPPROVING OF THAT DECISION 😂😂
Grandparents sent me a Xmas cheque I can't deposit because it's made out to T <@thecapitalidea's last name>. Well played tbh.
My gnarly bruising now looks like dirt all over the back of my leg 😒 https://t.co/34Fo0U9TeZ
@mmitchellanyon Female protagonist and a diverse cast. Your average white guy's nightmare 👍👍
Enjoyed the heck out of Rogue One.
I have visited Havana twice today #goodcustomer #bademployee
A motley crew of people still at work crammed into Havana instead of walking to a more spacious cafe so as not to abandon me & my bad leg 😍
@_kellydare me too. What a devastating story.
I'm at work, in that I parked my car there and went directly to the cafe next door where I am sitting with my work phone on the table.

Frumpy Gay.
Meh, close enough. https://t.co/gj3nNyPhFI
@AMidnightVoyage @thecapitalidea & I saw that alone in a Bulgarian movie theatre on a wet day. It's so bad but has lovely memories attached.
I did that *send an email, realise it was part of a chain the recipient shouldn't see, frantically hit recall* thing. I want to DIE.
Pictured cat gang not criminal element.
I thought this headline was brilliant BUT THEN I saw the photo caption. https://t.co/Rvo6wicfSn
@ehjc Excellent, thanks.
@_kellydare I couldn't find one at Moore Wilsons... I will look harder!
